support.howToUpgrade: How do I upgrade my plan?
support.howToUpgradeAnswer: Visit the Plans page and select your desired plan. Upgrades take effect immediately.
support.howToCancel: How do I cancel my subscription?
support.howToCancelAnswer: You can cancel anytime. Your subscription remains active until the end of the billing period.
